description:
--> A cool and engaging way to get ready and learn sports facts 
--> Pick your athlete and your sport and outfit him for competition 
--> Playful animations and interactive fun brings the games alive for kids 
--> Learn about Judo and Gymnastics, Boxing, Fencing, Swimming and more  
--> Specially designed for young children 

Sport Athlete Builder app is specifically designed for young kids to become familiar with several summer sports. The app is interactive with features that allow kids to outfit their athletes and learn about the Games. Filled with action and humor, Sport Athlete Builder  will educate and entertain children.  The app is designed for young children to experience basic facts about several summer sports while creatively outfitting their athletes. 
 
Features:
--> 7 different sport categories: Fencing, Swimming, Boxing, Gymnastics, Weightlifting, Cycling, Judo
--> Outfit and play with the athletes and match them to their sport
--> 9 pages of beautiful HD illustrations combined with rich and funny interactive animations.
--> Educational teaching text on each of the sports, accompanied with voice over.
 
ABOUT TabTale
